message.body: Yo I got your card, so sweet!!
Your gift was so sweet!
I disagree, I mean yeah, no one likes a cliffhanger
But it really got me, and had my racking my brain for old flash forwards
Oh yeah those two are done for
In other news I am kind of annoyed with breaking bad, I thought the ending was cheap and they're better than that!
Richard thinks the criminals are gonna kill hank & Gomie and that is why ww is buying the giant gun, so they can shoot down police choppers and whatnot.
I think hank and Gomie will pull it off (maybe Jesse calls for help??) and ww needs the big gun because all his muscle is dead!
No way!
Those jerk Aryans
They get me so mad
But they're the good guys! :(
I know! Gomie will get em!! #believe
It just doesn't look good
And hank, let this case consume him
And now it'll do him in
Dude I bet Marie will kill skylar if hank dies
I just hope this all ends with Flynn somewhere far away, eating breakfast
OMG totally, she's losing it
Lol! He loves breakfast
I was so happy to see Jesse outsmarting ww for once, I reallyreallyREALLY want him to find a way out
I do too, I think he'll sneak out of the car, I really hope he makes it!
Also what is up with mrs scared eyes and baby white power?
Ew. Just ew.
God also, don't you hate walt's lying voice? I'm going to last week
Exactly! He gets this nerdy teacher voice
Ugghhhhhh I cannot even handle how he lays it on Jesse!! Also the awesome gas mishap story. Yeah RITE, Walt. I think his good luck is about to run out!
Also, I have become really fond of huell. More huell please.
I guess he's a great actor and all
Right?!
I forgot why Walt even poisoned Brock back in the day, weird how it is suddenly really important again?
